name: Splatter Beach
description:
Splatter Beach is a reskin of Splatter School made by the same developer of said game as a "sequel". The game was released in late 2013, about a year and half after the first game.
Contrary to Splatter School, this game has a passable storyline with cutscenes and a few new game mechanics, such hostages to rescue.
The controls are no different from those of the Splatter school.
